synopsis.text: Patty and Liz, the Demon Twin Pistols, along with their wielder, Death the Kid, the Shinigami's son, join forces with Blackâ˜†Star and his partner, Demon Blade Tsubaki, and Maka Albarn and her partner, Soul Eater Evans, in an action-packed adventure to become Death Scythes. Set in the Shinigami technical school for weapon technicians, these students must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and one witch to transform their human weapons into Death Scythes, the highest title for a weapon and fit for use by the Shinigami. While defending Death City from powerful creatures and attending school, these young meisters and their weapons embark on a journey to become stronger and prevent the souls from falling into the wrong hands, all while trying to save the world from its doom. With extra scenes added in the 'Late Show' version, Soul Eater offers a unique blend of humor, action, and fantasy that is sure to entertain.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
